name: E.B._White
text:
E.B. White
E.B. White was the author of Charlotte's Web.
Behind the scenes
E.B. White (July 11, 1899 – October 1, 1985) was an American writer known for his children's books Stuart Little, Charlotte's Web, and The Trumpet of the Swan, as well as co-authoring the English writing style guide The Elements of Style.
